game.name: Attack on Fatboy
game.description:
Join Attack on Fatboy and gorget all the action-packed challenges you have tried out ever! Right from exploring your ultimate shooter abilities to implementing the effective strategies and techniques to kill your enemies â€“ you find everything in this brand new action game. Your planet has been invaded by a horde of extra-terrestrials and the only way to protect your land against them is destroy all of them. Grab your gun and get ready to fight like a true action-hero against deadly aliens in a fierce battle!
You as an intergalactic warrior are also lashed with the advanced weapon so enter the battlefield to finish all the blood-thirsty souls. It is your responsibility now to purge them from the planet. Enemies are very cruel and do not leave you if they spot in the sky. Keep your eyes on their boss, the Fatboy, who will try to put every possible effort to stop you from achieving your goal in this html5 shooting game! These enemies are multiple in numbers. You find out the alien commander Fatboy sitting on his throne. Throw him out from your planet by showing your intense fighting moves!
Hurdles can come to you from any direction. So it is important to open your eyes all the time and keep your gun ready and moving your character to protect it from the attacks of your enemies. Do not forget to apply the super power to complete each fighting puzzle in different 20 levels of this challenging fighting adventure. Do your best to the Earth get back to their normal routine again! Unleash the unstoppable beam by filling up your special meter! Select the blue or red character and be prepared for the unique harrowing wars!
